page.title: 06FAST FOOD SHOPS IN SLOUGH
page.content: Slough has five fast food shops, which demonstrates the demand for such outlets.As more of these kind of shops open,smaller,more traditional cafes are forced to close. The burger shops are usually large, bright and cheerful American -run firms,which have a vending company behind them supporting the very expensive buying and maintaining of the machinery required. The pizza shops are the most popular at the moment as people said they think of them as healthy. The fish and chip shops are the safest bet for a trader as the demand is consistent. All these shops cause a problem in the streets as litter is blown about and people don't make proper use of the bins provided.
